front.title: Router-supported Data Regeneration for In-network Storage Systems

abstract.t: In-network storage systems store redundancy to compensate for thedata loss incurred by hardware failures or other reasons. Thisdocument introduces a practical work of router-supported dataregeneration in in-network storage systems to maintain the amount ofredundancy. This proposed regeneration process can exploit thebandwidth diversity in the network, and the corresponding protocolenables supporting routers work transparently to support theregeneration process.
